story: Once upon a time, there was a lion with a heart of gold. He loved storytelling, and would regale his friends with tales of faraway lands and heroic adventures. One day, he decided to leave the comfort of his home and explore the world for himself. As he traveled, he discovered many wondrous things to share with others.

characters.description: The Lion: A brave and noble lion with a heart of gold

imageDescription: A majestic lion looking out upon the horizon while standing atop a grassy knoll.
